sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Updates class_count in ml_solution table by counting rows in ml_class table for existing solutions.</description>
        <name>Update 'ml_solution.class_count' column</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr_ml_solution = new GlideRecord('ml_solution');
gr_ml_solution.query();

while(gr_ml_solution.next()){
   var gr_ml_class = new GlideRecord('ml_class');
   gr_ml_class.addQuery('solution',gr_ml_solution.sys_id);
   gr_ml_class.query();
   var ml_class_count = gr_ml_class.getRowCount();
   gr_ml_solution.class_count = ml_class_count;
   gr_ml_solution.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-10-02 11:14:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>e5666ddb733023000256f259faf6a72a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update 'ml_solution.class_count' column</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Predictive Intelligence" source="com.glide.platform_ml">c41430683c31311068bcf327dfe37f28</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e5666ddb733023000256f259faf6a72a</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-10-02 18:10:13</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
